oai_dc:dc.dc:title: For Conventions, Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: buildings; conventions; tourism; 1920s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A booklet designed to market the city of Memphis to convention planners. It highlights images of the city's amenities and attractions.
